name: FrostFire (itch) (brinorios, RegiWall, Jarod Perez - BrassCircuits, JamInTheJukebox)
name_original: FrostFire (itch) (brinorios, RegiWall, Jarod Perez - BrassCircuits, JamInTheJukebox)
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for the annual Chillenium competition. It is a tower defense game that requires players to place both fire and ice towers to defend against different types of enemies-- but the fire and ice towers can't be too close to each other.

Created by Jarod Perez, David Martinez, Walker Register, Briana Ginorio
